title: Funnel Keyword Generator
description: Generate keyword ideas across all marketing funnel stages (Awareness, Consideration, Decision, Conversion, Post-Purchase) based on your brand, sector, and target market.

brand.title: Brand(s)
brand.description: Brand or list of brands to contextualize the funnel. Can be a single brand name (e.g., 'Nike') or multiple brands.

sector.title: Sector/Industry
sector.description: Sector to contextualize the funnel, e.g., 'running shoes', 'CRM software', 'electric cars'.

language.title: Language
language.description: Language for keyword generation as 2-letter ISO code, e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr'.

country.title: Country (optional)
country.description: Country to contextualize the funnel as 2-letter ISO code, e.g., 'us', 'es', 'gb'. Leave empty for global.

max_ideas_per_category.title: Max Ideas per Category
max_ideas_per_category.description: Maximum number of keyword ideas to generate per funnel category. Higher values provide more comprehensive results but take longer.

stages.title: Funnel Stages (optional)
stages.description: Optional list of specific funnel stage names to generate keywords for. If empty, all stages are processed. Available stages: 'Awareness / Discovery', 'Consideration / Research', 'Decision / Evaluation', 'Conversion / Action', 'Post-Purchase / Retention & Advocacy'.
